text: 8.4 Gal 5.16, 5.25 Mɨñɨl pen chɨn mubwak gos nab nedil ayaŋ anɨb ak tek kɨdek ma gobun. Chɨn God Kawnan gos ne ak kɨdek gobun. God ne anɨgɨl gos nɨgup, tap teplep takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdeb ak, gos tɨmud chɨn ayaŋ awl gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, tap si tap tɨmel gep kɨles ak gek, pɨsnep apyap pakak.
